nodes.text: The bounty hunter Zam Wesell used electro-goggles which aided in magnification and rangefinding when targeting, such as while hunting Senator Padmé Amidala in 22 BBY. She also used them to see Obi-Wan Kenobi hanging on to the droid that was used to release the creatures that were meant to kill the senator. Information was displayed on the viewfinder in an unknown script.
The electro-goggles were created by the prop department for Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones.
